args.subject: Invoice for your mouse purchase
args.body:
Hi Alice,

I've reordered the same TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse you bought previously (Order ID: ORDER-450548). I've applied my available discount code SPRING10 during checkout. The total charged to my account was $162.00. Please let me know if you need anything else.

Best,
Emma Johnson
